programme.title: The $100,000 Pyramid S6
programme.desc: Two teams of two compete in a word-association game. Each contestant gets a celebrity partner, and one partner provides clues to the other about six mystery words, leaving the other to guess those words before the time runs out. The team with the most points gets to play in the winners circle, where the top prize is $100,000. Michael Strahan hosts.

programme.title: MasterChef Junior USA S8
programme.desc: After facing a nutty Mystery Box challenge, 11 junior chefs compete in a fiery elimination challenge. They also welcome back MASTERCHEF Junior Edition Season Seven winner Che Spiotta.

programme.title: India Unplated S1
programme.desc: The episode features Kashmir's popular Tabak Maz (twice cooked lamb ribs) by Adam followed by Helly's Guchi Pulao using native Australian ingredients and Sandeep's recipe for Tamatar Gada, a traditional tomato and fish recipe that he grew up eating as a child in Kashmir.

programme.title: Building Giants S3
programme.desc: See the race to build the world's next generation of engineering wonders in this award-winning series.

programme.title: Celebrity Wheel Of Fortune S2
programme.desc: Various celebrities compete against each other by solving word puzzles in order to win cash prizes that are determined by a spinning wheel.

programme.title: Kids Say The Darndest Things S2
programme.desc: Tiffany Haddish hosts this update to the classic TV show that spotlights kids talking about their perspective on things.

programme.title: The Green Planet
programme.desc: Deserts are hostile; temperatures soar and water is rare. Yet plants find extraordinary ways to survive. They may grow imperceptibly slowly or travel the landscape looking for water. Others wait decades in suspended animation for rain to power an explosion of colour across the dunes. Desert plants protect their water stores from animals and from each other, using vicious spines, camouflage or by forging alliances with animals. Plants have invaded the most dangerous deserts on earth, overcoming.

programme.title: Slugterra S1
programme.desc: Slugterra is an epic sci-fi comedy adventure set deep underground, where the ammo's alive and only the quick survive! In this luminous, high-tech, underground world every cavern holds a new adventure, new battle and weird little slugs to be discovered!

programme.title: Johnny Test S4
programme.desc: The adventures of average suburban boy Johnny Test, who wittingly plays test subject for his genius twin sisters' various experiments, reluctantly fighting evil villains in the process.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S8
programme.desc: Led by a boy named Ryder, a team of six playful rescue dogs use their individual talents to protect the seaside town of Adventure Bay. The pups are occasionally joined by newer helpers: Cap'n Turbot, Robo-Dog, Everest, and Tracker.

programme.title: Pororo The Little Penguin S6
programme.desc: Join Pororo and friends in their fun adventures!

programme.title: Sunshine Station
programme.desc: Jimmy and Jenny run a very special bus station - the Sunshine Station! It isn't just a place you go to get to a destination. It is a destination in itself - a destination of endless fun, songs, dances, discovery and wonders! At the Sunshine Station, pre-schoolers embark on a learning journey to discover the world around them by going to various interesting locations around Singapore.

programme.title: Pinkfong Songs & Stories
programme.desc: Enjoy the best of Pinkfong's most loved songs and stories with all your favourite characters!

programme.title: Sesame Street S53
programme.desc: In this season, Ji-Young, a Korean-American girl muppet joins the main cast!

programme.title: Dora And Friends: Into The City S1
programme.desc: Dora, a young girl, starts going to school in the city of Playa Verde. Along with her friends, Kate, Naiya, Emma, Alana and Pablo, Dora embarks on various adventures to explore the city.

programme.title: Ollie And Friends S6
programme.desc: Cherry finds a magic-8-ball and uses it to 'predict' things. She grows over-reliant on it, but her friends let her know that she doesn't need the magic-8-ball to do amazing things. The Shifty Squares think Sloppy's their hero after he saves them for his newly-rebuilt cleaning robot. However, when the Shifty Squares start copying Sloppy's every move, it's time for Cherry, Ollie, and Sloppy to teach them to be themselves.

programme.title: GUS The Itsy Bitsy Knight
programme.desc: Follow small, grasshopper-sized boy named Gus who wishes to become the greatest knight in all the kingdom of Karamel! Armed with his laser sword and mounted on his electric pony, Gus will never miss an opportunity to pursue adventure and win the day.

programme.desc: A new species of Transformers must find their place and purpose among Autobots, Decepticons, and the human family who adopts them.

programme.title: The Haunted House: Secret Of The Ghost Ball
programme.desc: There is something not quite right about Shinbi Apartment. Ever since siblings Hari and Doori moved in, they could tell right away that everything seemed a little off. Is it the look? Is it the feel? Is it the smell? Maybe it is the ghosts!

programme.title: Mount Emily: Guardians Of The Crystal
programme.desc: In 1819, Baba's Students must solve a riddle to learn the secrets of a mind control gem. In 1989, Patsy and Elena realise they've traveled back in time into their mother's bodies. Moments before a spelling competition with huge stakes.

programme.title: On The Red Dot - Bargain Hunters
programme.desc: Prices have gone up. Some have come together to buy things in bulk at lower prices. From groceries to home fixtures, savings can be as much as 30% to thousands of dollars. How can we join a group buy?

programme.title: Talking Point
programme.desc: Do you store medication at home? Ever notice their expiry date, but don't bother about it? Host Steven Chia investigates the efficacy of expired medication and if they are even safe for us to consume.

programme.title: Tanglin
programme.desc: Michael bears a grudge against Xue Ling when he discovers how Adam's depression was triggered by her. Meera returns from her rehab and is shocked when she witnesses Shruti's emotional outburst. At TCH, Zul enlists the help of Ismail to get Mark a job at Life Feed.

programme.title: Clean It, Fix It S2
programme.desc: Master builder and household favourite Tommy Walsh is joined by expert pro cleaner Maxine Dwyer and creative carpenter Asher Edwards, as they meet people across the UK who are struggling with household chaos, grime and clutter. Much more than a makeover show, our dynamic professionals provide real-life, practical solutions, invaluable tips and insider tricks to give viewers brilliant take-away ideas for bettering their own living spaces.

programme.title: The Chefs' Line S2
programme.desc: Every top restaurant has a line of chefs leading to the top, from the Commis chef to the Head chef. This celebratory cooking competition pitches at-home cooking enthusiasts against professionals, starting at the bottom and working their way up. Can they beat their way to the top of The Chef's Line?

programme.title: Press Your Luck S2
programme.desc: Hosted by Elizabeth Banks, Press Your Luck is a game of wits, strategy and even higher stakes as contestants try to avoid the iconic and devilish WHAMMY for a chance at life-changing cash and prizes. During each game of Press Your Luck, three contestants compete against each other, answering questions to earn spins on the Big Board.

programme.title: Titipo The Little Train S3

programme.title: Pinkfong Songs & Stories

programme.title: Paula & Pals S2

programme.title: Paula & Pals S2

programme.title: Marblegen

Forming the Meteor team, Assa, Cosmo, Luna and Sam decided to participate in the Olympia MARBLEGAMES, one of the biggest tournaments on the planet! Their objective: to prevent the terrible Marcellus King from seizing the powerful Mercury ball, a reward offered to the winners.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12
programme.desc: The misadventures of a talking sea sponge who works at a fast food restaurant, attends a boating school, and lives in an underwater pineapple.

programme.title: Make It Count
programme.desc: Joakim and Charmian play detectives at the National Gallery Singapore and go in search of Math in Art. Seemingly strange bedfellows, Math has been a part of Art for thousands of years. Together, they spy the Golden Ratio in paintings, discover symmetry in artwork and scout out perspectives in then galleries. Then, armed with the Math ideas, the duo goes to an art school to see how using Math in Art improves their craft. It's Math like you've never imagined it before.

programme.title: Pfffirates
programme.desc: On Calypso Island, three crews are taught Pfffiracy by the legendary Captain Lamar. This tough training program ranges from sailing exercises and treasure hunting competitions to cannon firing and accosting enemy ships! But it would take more than that for Pat, Lily or Stede to give up. When a Pfffirate has friends to count on, nothing is impossible!

programme.title: 至尊红颜
programme.desc: (PG)(重) 豪门贾家内部暗流汹涌。三女增金 (陈丽贞) 因丈夫奇才 (黄奕良) 而被卷入命案，并与侄子若其 (许立桦) 反目成仇。她害死两条人命后被赶出家门，儿子玉其 (张向晖) 也被诬告入狱。贾家媳妇曦怡 (范文芳) 也与四女增银陷入三角关系的情爱纠纷被迫离去，最后情场失足。孙女婿仲贤 (曹国辉) 加入贾家金乐集团后，就把它占为己有。曦怡、增金、若其三人后来重聚，觉悟己非，才找出了命案真凶，奇才父子含冤得雪。曦怡和增金回归贾家，把仲贤逼出家族企业。金乐最终虽难逃解体命运，却换来一家人融洽的相处.

programme.title: 金色大道
programme.desc: (PG-些许性相关语)(重) 建志觉得阿通是累赘，竟萌起推他下楼的念头，庆幸最后悬崖勒马。阿通见警方没找上门，意识到没杀死人，后悔因害怕逃走没抢走对方的钱财。珍婷被Arthur抛弃，珍玉担心她做傻事，六木扬言会保护珍婷。一聪传授六木致富之道。建志在家慧醉酒下和她发生关系，想要负责，家慧却拒绝。珍婷献身给Arthur，逼迫他宣布与富家女退婚…….

programme.title: 绚耀爱情
programme.desc: 来到日本山形县，双J终于见识了能歌善舞的日本见习舞娘，并被她们超高的技艺所折服。然而，铭耀却做了一件让舞技们傻眼的事，到底是什么呢？.

programme.title: 星期二特写 ：我行我路
programme.desc: 七十二岁的陈瑞月儿时染上小儿麻痹症，需靠轮椅代步。热爱跳舞的她，在退休后创办轮椅舞团展现舞姿。芳龄二十四的视障艺术家张丽玲患有罕见眼疾，却坚毅踏上表演艺术道路。是什么推动她们勇敢追梦？她们的自立自强，又如何鼓舞他人实现自我价值？.

programme.title: 时光倾城
programme.desc: (PG-些许性相关语) 禾风请贵山帮忙查找爱情骗子资料，月心假装相亲约会骗子袁帅，月心狼狈，差点暴露身份，禾风对她数落一番。月心不甘心，不听劝告独自前往约会，被识破身份并迷晕非礼。Hanzo 早有计划，借此机会检举敌对势力救月心，博其好感。禾风得知月心经历，愧疚道歉。月心反应过度，情绪激动哭泣离开，禾风吓了一跳…….

programme.desc: (PG13-成人题材)(重) 这是一个讲述香港海关的故事，透过版权及商标调查科、贸易管制处总贸易管制和海关毒品调查课各个部门，带领一众海关菁英及年青新晋，展示出智慧海关的新面貌，以及秉持护法守关、专业承担的宗旨，为社会的稳定与繁荣作出贡献。.

programme.title: 敦煌，千年不散的宴席
programme.desc: (PG) 中华民族之所以五千年生生不息、绵延不绝，就是因为我们的语言、文字、风俗、饮食都是千年传承，从来没有中断。观众发现，以往秦川、安秋导演创作的敦煌纪录片都承载了非常厚重的历史文化信息，这次的美食片却大不一样，从主题定位、人物故事、叙事方式等都有了非常大的改变，叙述风格也生动活泼了很多，让观众看到了更多的人间烟火，一种田园诗般的美。该片通过将敦煌壁画饮食文化呈现出来，并将当下敦煌百姓的生活状态、一日三餐、加工食物的过程忠实记录下来，以展现敦煌饮食文化的传承与发展。.

programme.desc: 《焦点》追踪国际时事，实地报道区域课题，以新加坡的视角分析时局发展的前因后果和潜在影响.

programme.title: 银色嘉年华 2024
programme.desc: 新系列的《银色嘉年华》，向云与郭亮首次搭档主持！每周为您献上《快乐潮龄》、或《乐在慢活》的精彩访谈，与运动专家一起带着大家活动筋骨，《活出精彩》！全新的烹饪单元，《健康新食代》，从健康出发，名厨用创意翻新料理，教您吃出健康来！还有《那些年那些歌》，首首好歌，带你回到记忆中最美好的那些年。敬请期待.

programme.title: 黄金年华之斗歌竞艺
programme.desc: 24位年过半百的乐龄人士将在《黄金年华之斗歌竟艺2024年 第1系列》的舞台上尽情展现对歌唱的热诚，完成埋藏在心中的梦想。新一系列的节目将延续团战形式，让参赛者通过挑战不同的歌曲主题，体验更多元有趣的舞台，展现自己的实力，过关斩将成为冠军。《黄金年华》赛情精彩，不容错过.

programme.title: 敦煌，千年不散的宴席
programme.desc: 中华民族之所以五千年生生不息、绵延不绝，就是因为我们的语言、文字、风俗、饮食都是千年传承，从来没有中断。观众发现，以往秦川、安秋导演创作的敦煌纪录片都承载了非常厚重的历史文化信息，这次的美食片却大不一样，从主题定位、人物故事、叙事方式等都有了非常大的改变，叙述风格也生动活泼了很多，让观众看到了更多的人间烟火，一种田园诗般的美。该片通过将敦煌壁画饮食文化呈现出来，并将当下敦煌百姓的生活状态、一日三餐、加工食物的过程忠实记录下来，以展现敦煌饮食文化的传承与发展.

programme.title: 食物心理学
programme.desc: 饮食是最疗愈身心的日常，从你爱吃的食物不仅能看出你的内在真实性格，还能抚慰你孤独的心灵。现在就跟阿贤一起掌握美味健康秘诀，让你的心灵与味蕾双满足.

programme.title: 《川•味》第四季
programme.desc: 叶山娃的“裹脚肉”，“苗乡第一刀”的招牌，让他在“江湖”立足。全家出动，是酒楼更是酒家。陈有文的“蛋圆子和焯蛋”，来自田埂深处那个冒着炊烟的人家，用一出家宴为秋收画上最好的句点。从未离开过小镇的刘忠兄妹一辈子守着他们的小店，车马穿行，他们不改初心……守望，也是一种力量。早早停留，他们也许至今没有见识过世界的广博，对大多数人来讲，似乎有一个能看到头的未来。但对他们来说，或许只是不在急急切切的出世与入世间迷失，心中自有愿景和希望。他们选择留守乡村，让他们秉持真心，专注一味，给自己的美食拖住了底。不是止步原点，.

programme.title: 人心鉴定师
programme.desc: 张叔曾经接待过的顾客突然带了鉴定师上门，指张叔鉴定错误，存心欺骗，扬言要去投诉。火昌不解张叔为什么会犯下这样的错，张叔称因妻子有病，他心神不宁，才看走了眼。其实这一切都是张叔和庆丰的计谋…….

programme.title: 人心鉴定师

programme.title: 绅探
programme.desc: Ep 22: 秦小曼奋不顾身跑进火场里企图营救王积富，在紧急关头，杜金保救出了秦小曼后在警局坦白交待自己就是纵火犯。罗非怀疑杜金保替人顶罪，真正的纵火犯另有其人。Ep 23: 罗非一大早带领秦小曼到汇旗银行，还原十年前钻石失窃案经过。他推断赵大同诱导金查理选了他提前准备好的保险柜以进行盗窃钻石计划.

programme.title: 至尊红颜
programme.desc: 豪门贾家内部暗流汹涌。三女增金 (陈丽贞) 因丈夫奇才 (黄奕良) 而被卷入命案，并与侄子若其 (许立桦) 反目成仇。她害死两条人命后被赶出家门，儿子玉其 (张向晖) 也被诬告入狱。贾家媳妇曦怡 (范文芳) 也与四女增银陷入三角关系的情爱纠纷被迫离去，最后情场失足。孙女婿仲贤 (曹国辉) 加入贾家金乐集团后，就把它占为己有。曦怡、增金、若其三人后来重聚，觉悟己非，才找出了命案真凶，奇才父子含冤得雪。曦怡和增金回归贾家，把仲贤逼出家族企业。金乐最终虽难逃解体命运，却换来一家人融洽的相处.

programme.title: 星期二特写 ： 厂区探游
programme.desc: 兀兰工业区聚集前结霜桥旧货商，其中一位“梁婆婆”外表凶悍实则善待外劳顾客。旧货摊旁边咖啡店有敬老歌台，唱歌还有伴舞。双溪加株老字号木材厂重用一批娘子军。那一带木业曾经辉煌，不但衍生相关的道具和布景公司，更激发年轻人设立工作坊，以时尚方式带动国人爱上做手工.

programme.title: 木棘证人
programme.desc: Ver B (#Ep 15)力基下属朱学仁给他留下一组数字后无故失踪，重案组接手调查。学仁终于被寻回，事件更牵涉贩毒案。Ver C (#Ep 16)颂盈收到告密信，指公司有人耍花招 , 货物有问题，颂盈便回公司，秘密调查告密者，终在公司查到写匿名信的人.

programme.title: 拜托了夏天

programme.title: 世界跟我这Young玩
programme.desc: (重) 旅行可以千篇一律，也可以万中选一。如果你喜爱独特胜过跟风，期待在大城市激荡出一连串美丽的小惊奇，那跟着我们就对了！ 「世界跟我这Young玩」采用时下年轻人最IN的随拍记录，且战且走，细细品味旅游二三事。.

programme.title: 笔墨间的飨宴
programme.desc: (重) 古典名著《水浒传》里108位英雄，缔造出世代津津乐道的传奇事迹。豪情万丈的英雄气息，在中国山东梁山，不只可以感受得到，也品尝得到。这一集，主持人杨君伟登上梁山，赴一场精美绝伦的水浒飨宴。.

programme.title: 双重人生

programme.title: Permintaan Terakhir Abah
programme.desc: Abah's Last Request tells the story of Abah who wants to unite his children who are increasingly separated due to differences of opinion among them. Abah is determined to fix the situation by making a strange request, which is for his children to come home and gather in the village because his cancer is getting chronic and he believes that this may be his last Ramadhan and Syawal. The children who are at odds are willing to bury their egos by fulfilling Abah's last request and finally come back.

programme.title: Aku Titipkan Cinta
programme.desc: A tragic accident involved a rich young CEO, Zaki and Khanza, a home-based tempe'or soya bean maker. The accident causes Khanza to lose her memory and kills Zaki's mother, who is driving the car. Khanza, who loses her memory, is a key witness to the car accident. It turns out a mysterious man has planned to eliminate both of them. Zaki and Khanza meet again when Zaki tries to drive out Khanza from her home factory.
